name: FIND-NALLY
description:
📣 Hello Detectives! Welcome to FIND-NALLY 👮 Disclaimer

This game is a part of project in GI344 Game Design and Production class from Bangkok University.

👮 Intro

Be ready to help Mr.9 find everything out and collect all of the detective teams!

👮 About FINDNALLY

FINDNALLY is a hidden object game, you have to find all items in the picture to pass level. The game has two mode, Normal and Endless. Normal Mode has a timer, you have to find all items before time out to win level. Endless Mode doesn't has a timer, you can spend all day to find all items to win level.

- FINDNALLY was build for mobile game but in this case I made it for PC version. Mobile version coming soon !

👮 How to play

• Find all items hidden in the picture

• To control, use your eyes to find items and all you need is just clicking on the screen

• Press F1 to open cheat
